channel.title: Groovy on Octavio Lugo Camacho
channel.description: Recent content in Groovy on Octavio Lugo Camacho

item.title: What is Groovy and how do I install it?
item.description: What is Groovy? Groovy is powerful, optionally typed and dynamic language to develop an application on Java Platform where its syntax is Java-like. Its typing discipline is strong, static, and dynamic. The best things about Groovy are that since it extends JDK, it accepts Java code. Groovy can be used as both programming and scripting Language. Groovy is a superset of Java which means Java program will run in Groovy environment but vice-versa may or may not be possible.
